About
=====

**pytest-appengine** is a 


Installation
============

.. code-block:: shell

    $ pip install pytest-appengine


Compatibility
=============

This code is tested against python versions **2.7**, **3.3**, **3.4** and
**3.5**.


Contributing
============

Setting up development repo
---------------------------

.. code-block:: shell

    $ git clone git@github.com:novopl/pytest-appengine.git
    $ cd pytest-appengine
    $ virtualenv env
    $ source ./env/bin/activate
    $ ./devinit.sh
